alert.note: Alert for Branch; Hillsdale (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 1:32AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Steuben, southeastern Branch, southern Hillsdale, northern Henry, Williams and Fulton Counties through 215 AM EDT... At 132 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hudson to near Fremont. Movement was southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Fayette around 145 AM EDT. Pioneer around 150 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Wauseon, Montpelier, Holiday City, Bryan, West Unity, Delta, Stryker, Archbold and Swanton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Michigan between mile markers 1 and 3. Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 151 and 153. Interstate 80 in Ohio between mile markers 1 and 48. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 AM EDT for northeastern Indiana...southeastern and southwestern Michigan...and northwestern Ohio. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
